author: jainshilpi
body:
This is just a backport of #31974 - 2017 and 2018 UL scales and smearing in nanoAOD. Updated files are:
(1) nano_cff.py
(2) photon_cff.py
(3) electron_cff.py

@mariadalfonso
title: Backport of UL (2017 and 2018) scale and smearing corrections in nanoAOD photons and electrons (106X)
